author: Gilbert T. Sewall
title: Remember the Black Death and Be Thankful This Isn’t It
description: The plague turned medieval existence upside down. Could another viral cull take a similar toll in the future? The post Remember the Black Death and Be Thankful This Isn’t It appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: The plague turned medieval existence upside down. Could another viral cull take a similar toll in the future?As an example of biomedical catastrophe, the Black Death of the 14th century stands unmatched. The coronavirus, whatever global havoc it might wreak, … [+6525 chars]
